title: Dps drop fron 130  to 10
body:
Hi i have  quad core 2,2 and phenomenon 9550  4 GB  ram 1gb graphic radeon HD 4890
 If I go fight with team then my fps drop from 120 to 10 and I am ysind w7

replies.body:
I know that on Mac OS High Sierra, I have FPS Issues with my laptop due to graphic card driver issues. you might have something similar. If I switch my hard drive to my sisters laptop,(one without graphic card) the FPS Issues go away.

I got 60 fps max settings on my sisters computer (without graphic card)
and 2-40 fps lowest setting on my computer (with graphic card)

both cpu's are nearly identical (intel i7 2.2GHz hers, intel i7 2.5 GHz mine), and with 16 GB Ram

Your pc could just be going through some general wear and tear like outdated drivers or bad game files.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help boost those frames.  I hope that helps!
